section.title: com.thealgorithms.others.LowestBasePalindrome Class Reference
Detailed Description
section.para: Class for finding the lowest base in which a given integer is a palindrome. Includes auxiliary methods for converting between bases and reversing strings.
NOTE: There is potential for error, see note at line 63.

static int com.thealgorithms.others.LowestBasePalindrome.lowestBasePalindrome (int num)[static]
Given a number in base 10, returns the lowest base in which the number is represented by a palindrome (read the same left-to-right and right-to-left).
Parameters
num
A number in base 10.
Returns
The lowest base in which num is a palindrome.
